comments.author: fundacoin
comments.body: to continue on from our launch project report for our DRAMZ token.Dramz token has continued to show a strong uptrend in price movement gaining from initial launch price of 0.000005000 to the current price of 0.00005567 this is an equivalent rise of 100x within the first 10 daysOur first target is 0.01 cent with listing on CoinMarketCap and Coin Gecko which we predict will propel our token $DRAMZ to a wider audience and help facilitate the development of BubbleTopia.he current parabolic rise (rare occurrence) which is currently being witnessed as we speak, is showing that holders of the token have a strong commitment and trust in the project, with a lack of selling pressure in preparation for our upcoming game launch BubbleTopia.Another factor which may be in play, is the severe tight circulating supply in the DRAMZ/BNB pair token with currently only 31M in circulation.Top 10 wallet holding including vesting holds 93% of all tokensCirculating supply in market 7 %https://pancakeswap.finance/swap?outputCurrency=0x5F059aC4A928e45ba26c118CEc8CaAc8EEaC036bLaunch price100x in 10daysJune 25th â€” 0.00000500July 5th â€” 0.00005555Predictionthe current Circulating supply 32M could quickly evaporate with 1or 2 big buys leaving virtually little to no circulating supply in the market, thereby creating further pressure on the price, with an estimated price target of 0.01 centA 1,000,000 $DRAMZ purchase today for $50 could easily see dramatic returns as $DRAMZ continue its rise to our 0.01 cent price targetâ€¦DRAMZ TokenDramz is a utility token with a 20% BUSD reward payed to holders of our token. Dramz will be used to stake and provide rewards for players of our upcoming RPG game BubbleTopia due out in late 2022.We encourage our community who are interested in supporting BubbleTopia and our Token project $DRAMZ to D.Y.O.R into our game, project and team to discover our future plans, roadmap and game development that we have in place for all our community holders.for more information we have the following channelsWebsite: www.bubbletopia.ioWebsite: www.gamecrypto.coTwitter: https://twitter.com/GameCrypto_coDiscord: https://discord.gg/DKGNar6W8Q

comments.author: fundacoin
comments.body: DRAMZ Token Update #3Keeping our community updated on progressðŸš€First sale booked ðŸ˜± $120 Profit in 10 days from an initial ðŸ’° $20.00 PurchaseDRAMZ TokenOur first sale took place in DRAMZ resulting in a 500% profit ..A trader/investor took their first sale after 10 days of holdingInitial investment $20 = $120 return 500% profit in 10 days congratsDRAMZ TokenIn keeping our community updated on the progress of $DRAMZ we have witnessed the first Sale of tokens after 15 days of continued uptrendAs the founder and creator of $DRAMZ of course I would prefer to see our community hold for the long term, collect the 20% in BUSD as we build our upcoming RPG game BubbleTopia with utility and staking for our long term holders in our game.But taking a 500% profit after 10 days of holding, is completely understandable and we congratulate the trader on booking in a nice profit for a tiny outlay. Trading and support for our token is appreciated, as long term holders will be rewarded for holding from 20% in BUSD, while short term traders are rewarded from the token price appreciation.Currently there is a tiny 32M circulating supply (420M locked and vested), with a total supply of 550M so 500% can be expected if a trader gets the timing correct, but with a little patience, and for the right type of investor/trader who would be willing to hold, we would expect much bigger returns for the Diamond Hand investors..For more info or just have a chat, pls feel free to check us our on discord and our team can support or answer any Qs u may have.GL to all, hoping to see someðŸ’Ždiamond hands joining us as we grow our community. DiscordP.s: a quick rebound has just occurred, showing good overall support for $DRAMZ again trading at previous highs of 0.00006500 cents.www.bubbletopia.io ( RPG Game page )www.gamecrypto.co ( community and game site )Twitter (Social) https://twitter.com/GameCrypto_coDiscord (Social) https://discord.gg/bFv3H4u7CN

comments.body: âš¡ Altcoin Moonshot 1 Month Review ðŸš€ $DRAMZ Launch !!BSC TokenHard to believe were already 1 month since the launch of our $DRAMZ token on pancakeSwap, thankyou for your input and support on our Bitcoin forum, Discord channel and r/Dramz group.The growth of the $DRAMZ token has been top of mind, like all crypto currencies we are not immune to the selling pressures in difficult times that we face in todays crypto market, therefore I have asked our various groups and communities to help grow $DRAMZ by purchasing tokens to help support and ensure a continued price appreciation of the token.Below is the PancakeSwap dashboardhttps://pancakeswap.finance/swap?outputCurrency=0x5F059aC4A928e45ba26c118CEc8CaAc8EEaC036bMoving forward we need to be more entrepreneurial working together as a team with urgency and sharper focus, than allowing DRAMZ to appreciate at its own pace through organic growth and awareness. To achieve growth and steady price appreciation, currently investors and traders that purchase 1 million DRAMZ tokens can lock in the price of around $65.current price 0.00006555 Per DRAMZ (July 14th 2022) Scarcity breeds price appreciation - this is something we can control together as a group ethically and honestly, and by holding we can benefit in the long run, holders can also receive 20% in BUSD as a passive income which is implemented into the DRAMZ smart contract.We have a great opportunity in front of us today and I'm excited if are able to gain more members though Bitcoin forum and be part of our community by supporting $DRAMZ.I look forward to our new members support and input to help us reach our goal of 10 cents per token:)Kind regardsWayneFounder/CEOwww.gamecrypto.co$DRAMZ token
